Hi, I've been developing software for 30 years, and for the past 13, exclusively writing mobile apps for iOS. I plan to become a certified bicycle mechanic upon retirement in 3-5 years.â€©

I enjoy tinkering with electronics and reading sci-fi novels and comic books. I spend a lot of time on my bikes, paddling a kayak around the Salish Sea, and keeping up with my 14 year old daughter on a snowboard.
